entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23 except 13 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 23 except 13 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thundershower early in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023
